settings.title: How does this work?
settings.answer:
Hank’s pizza bases are delivered cold packed and vacuum sealed. Additional toppings are packed separately. Simply finish building your pizza and bake at 230c for 6-8 minutes.

Proper pizza, fresh from your home oven!

settings.title: Where and when do you deliver?
settings.answer:
GREATER SYDNEY: Wednesday, Thursday, Friday

CANBERRA: Friday

WOLLONGONG, SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS, GOULBURN: Friday

CENTRAL COAST: Thursday

BLUE MOUNTAINS / LITHGOW: Wednesday

settings.title: Is there a minimum order for delivery?
settings.answer: You'll need to spend $45 to have your Hank's delivered.

settings.title: What is the use by date of Hank’s bases?
settings.answer: Hank's pizza bases can be stored frozen for at least 8 weeks. Additional toppings which have been packed separately should be stored refrigerated.

settings.title: Do you have gluten free pizza?
settings.answer: Not yet, but it is in the pipeline!
